I went to see her for a few different things; anxiety, sinus issues, a ovarian cyst just to name a few. My cyst went way down in size, my sinuses have been so much better and I had chronic sinus issues and now won't be getting the surgery and the anxiety has dramatically improved! I cannot say enough good things about Erica, she treats the whole person and takes time to get to know you. I have seen other acupuncturist in the area and felt uncomfortable because there was lack of privacy and you could hear everything going on with the other patients. In her office that has never been the case, it's total privacy. I recommend Erica to my family and friends! - 4/26/2016 I first was treated by Erika several summers ago. She had been helping my wife for over a year. I was suffering from a pulled shoulder muscle/pinched nerve, and had been taking massive doses of aspirin and ibuprofen to deal with the constant pain. I also consulted my 'real' doctor and also tried massage therapy. Nothing worked. Then my wife persuaded me to permit Erika to try to help me. She's fantastic! She used a combination of acupuncture and localized massage and it worked. Fifteen months after the initial injury, the pain finally disappeared. I am pain-free and ever so grateful. I must admit that I was a true skeptic of natural medicine, but am now a confirmed believer.
